safetyTips: Please wait your turn and sanitise in and out.
name: THE EGG MACHINE
address: Bank Farm, Aldington, Ashford Kent TN25 7DF
description: The Egg Machine is a 24/7 farm shop vending machine selling free range eggs, milk, veg boxes, strawberries, asparagus, pies, scotch eggs, sausage rolls, cream teas and the world famous brownies! Open all the time, come early or late or in the middle of the night there will always be a great range of local produce available. Contactless payment and great social distancing systems in place.
